data.title: 112-01 Queens Boulevard #19C in Forest Hills, Queens
data.meta_description: 112-01 QUEENS BOULEVARD #19C is a sale unit in Forest Hills, Queens priced at $1,395,000.
data.text:
Welcome Home to Luxury Living with 270-Degree Panoramic Views!

Enjoy Magical Sunrises and Enchanting Sunsets from Your Sky-High Sanctuary

This rarely available, high-floor corner unit in the sought-after C line is a gem. With an expansive 1,327 square feet of interior space, this open, airy floorplan has been meticulously renovated, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views and top-of-the-line finishes.

Unmatched Features and Finishes:

- Panoramic Views: Wake up to the sun rising over the horizon and unwind with mesmerizing sunsets from your two private balconies. Enjoy magical sunsets on your primary terrace overlooking an unobstructed Manhattan skyline. An expansive 270-degree view from northeast to southwest overlooks Willow Lake, treetops, Fresh Meadows, and Forest Hills Gardens.

- Expansive Living Room: An entertainer’s dream, the living room provides ample space for two distinct seating areas, perfect for hosting gatherings.

- Chef’s Kitchen: Recently upgraded with a brand new LG appliance package, custom cabinets, premium stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a matching granite backsplash.

- Luxurious Primary Suite: The spacious primary bedroom is large enough to fit a king-size bed and features a custom-built, huge walk-in closet and a newly renovated primary bath with a spa-like walk-in shower.

- Versatile Second Bedroom: With three windows, this bright room provides enough space for a queen-size bed with side tables and includes a built-in wardrobe, making it perfect for a home office or child’s room.

- Modern Elegance: Upgraded custom hardwood designer interior doors with locks and automated blinds on windows ensure privacy and comfort. Sleek new flooring throughout enhances the contemporary aesthetic.

- In-Unit Washer/Dryer: Convenience at your fingertips.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant Forest Hills community with concerts at Forest Hills Stadium, boutique shopping on Austin Street, and delightful treats at Eddie’s Sweet Shop.

Situated at 112-01 Queens Boulevard in Forest Hills, Queens, The Pinnacle Condominium stands tall as a 27-story, 219-unit luxury building constructed in 1992, featuring three elevator banks and an exclusive elevator to the valet garage through the lobby.

Building Highlights:

- Grand Entrance: Circular driveway leading to a stunning double-height glass lobby with a landscaped private garden.

- BuildingLink: Enhancing the resident experience with modern conveniences.

Additional Luxuries:

- Walking Path and Sundeck: Spanning the entire building for your leisure.

- 60-Foot Indoor Lap Heated Pool: Recently renovated with luxurious amenities like a sauna, steam room, massage room, whirlpool, and locker rooms with towels and showers, giving you a 5-star spa experience.

- Extensive Health Club: Offering a variety of exercise classes including yoga and more.

- Indoor Valet Parking Garage: Available at an additional cost.

- Other Amenities: Billiards room, game room, ping pong room, TV lounge, children’s playroom, wine cellar, outdoor playground, banquet room, conference room, and full-service 24-hour concierge & doorman.

Positioned in a prime location with convenient access to transportation, parks, shopping, and dining, this is luxury living at its finest. Enjoy a movie at the local theater, access top-tier schools, and take advantage of easy access to transportation with the express E & F lines within 500 feet, multiple bus lines, LIRR, and major highways.
